task.title: Installation Procedure - User Manager
task.shortdesc: User Manager (UM) is a management system that can be used in various setups for ETO 1.0.

taskbody.prereq: Ensure that Constructor has been installed already on this machine.

context.note: ETO requires that the Windows Text Size be set to 100%. As of Windows 11, the default Text Size is now set to 125%. You must go to Control Panel > All Control Panel Items > Display and set the Text Size to 100% to use ETO, including the installers.

step.cmd: Note that User Manager is normally installed on one or more of the Builder user machines. Only one instance of User Manager is necessary to manage the ETO Users for a given site.
Double-click the User Manager Installer. You will see a window which will allow you to choose the Language using the dropdown.
Once you click OK, you are prompted to choose an install folder.

Accept the default install directory, or select the desired directory for ETO User Manager (note, this should match the Constructor Installation directory), then click Next . If this directory already exists, you will be asked if you wish to install to the existing folder. You should choose Yes.
Accept the default or choose a different Start Menu folder and click Next
Review the Installer settings, then click Install.
Click Finish. ETO is now installed on your machine.
